name: raycast-extensions
title: Raycast Extensions
description: The Say extension for Raycast allows you to convert text to speech using the built-in macOS voice synthesis. You can configure the voice, rate, and pitch of the speech output. The extension also supports saying selected text from any application and allows you to input text or type directly to say it.
author: litomore
